argumentText:
ARGUMENT
v

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lspsn.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lspsn.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 |  | lspsn.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lspsn.t | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 5 |  | lspsn.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_lspsn | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` { X } ) = { v | E. k e. K v = ( k .x. X ) } ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( U e. ( N ` { X } ) <-> U e. { v | E. k e. K v = ( k .x. X ) } ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_id | |- ( U = ( k .x. X ) -> U = ( k .x. X ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( k .x. X ) e. _V |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl6eqel | |- ( U = ( k .x. X ) -> U e. _V ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_rexlimivw | |- ( E. k e. K U = ( k .x. X ) -> U e. _V ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqeq1 | |- ( v = U -> ( v = ( k .x. X ) <-> U = ( k .x. X ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_rexbidv | |- ( v = U -> ( E. k e. K v = ( k .x. X ) <-> E. k e. K U = ( k .x. X ) ) ) |
| 14 | 11, 13 | #P_elab3 | |- ( U e. { v | E. k e. K v = ( k .x. X ) } <-> E. k e. K U = ( k .x. X ) ) |
| 15 | 7, 14 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( U e. ( N ` { X } ) <-> E. k e. K U = ( k .x. X ) ) ) |
